info.title: FundooHR Backend API's Specification
info.description: FundooHR is not a Software product, it is a thinking which make your task easy and efficient. And we are plotting our thining in software product. Which will make our work easy. Basically we are planning to make product based on some different technologies.

tags.name: Login
tags.description: Login API for already registered users through the backend.

tags.name: Report
tags.description: API for Engineer to download the report

post.description: It authenticates the user email from company database and it returns success response with email and token. For every REST call you need to pass token and crossponding email with some extra request body which is based on REST call's.

parameters.name: emailID
parameters.description: Provide a valid email address to authenticate. e.g. your@some-domain.com

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Provide a valid Password

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date parameter to get the Day, month & Year to filter the Dashboard based on month year

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to validate & authenticate

200.description: Successfull in retriving the Dashboard Data

401.description: Failed to retrive the Dashboard Data

get.description: Unmarked attendance employee list for a particular date, List of employee who took leaves 2 or more than 2 days in a month. Employees who didn't marked attendace for 3 or more than 3 days in a month (/readFalloutAttendanceEmployee, /readLeaveEmployee)

parameters.name: snapshotType
parameters.description: Snapshot Type of snapshot e.g. unmarked, fallout, leave

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date parameter to get the Day, Month & Year to filter the Dashboard data, which is based month year. Format needs to be in dd/mm/yyyy for .e.g. 01/01/2017

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to validate & authenticate

200.description: Success in getting the employee unmarked/Fallout/Leave attendance snapshot

401.description: Failed to retrive the employee unmarked/Fallout/Leave attendance snapshot

get.description: Summary of attandance for the selected range.

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: From Date parameter to get the Month & Year to get the attendance, Format needs to be in dd/mm/yyyy for .e.g. 01/01/2017

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: To Date parameter to get the Month & Year to get the attendance, Format needs to be in dd/mm/yyyy for .e.g. 01/01/2017

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to validate & authenticate

200.description: Success in returning the attendance summary for the selected date range

401.description: Failed to retrive the attendace summary for the selected date range

post.description: Notify employee for unmarked attendace for the date. Date format (dd/mm/yyyy)

parameters.name: notificationType
parameters.description: Email notification type e.g. unmarked, fallout, leave

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Unmark Date parameter to get the Day, Month & Year. Format needs to be in dd/mm/yyyy for .e.g. 01/01/2017

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to validate & authenticate

200.description: Success in sending notification to the employee for the unmark/fallout/leave date

401.description: Failed to send notification to the employee for the unmark/fallout/leave date

get.description: Shows the month attendance record of an employee.

parameters.name: engineerID
parameters.description: Engineer ID is unique for each engineer

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date parameter to get the Month & Year. Format needs to be in dd/mm/yyyy for .e.g. 01/01/2017

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to validate & authenticate

200.description: Success in getting employee attendance record for a month

401.description: Failed to get the employee attendance record for a month

parameters.name: Scehma
parameters.description: JSON format for sending the employee details & attendance details.

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to validate & authenticate

200.description: Success in getting employee attendance record for a month

401.description: Failed to get the employee attendance record for a month

get.description: Use 'hr', personal', 'profile', 'tack', 'bank' to get the Engineer HR, Personal, Profile (Educational), Tracking & Bank Account details respectively. Merged API's (readEmployeeHRData, readEmployeePersonalData, readEmployeeProfileData, readEmployeeTrackingData, readEmployeeBankData)

parameters.name: dataType
parameters.description: Employee Data type e.g. HR, Personal, Profile, Track, Bank

parameters.name: engineerID
parameters.description: Engineer ID needs to be valid

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to validate & authenticate

200.description: Success in getting Employee HR, Personal, Profile (Educational), Tracking & Bank Account details

401.description: Failed to retrive Employee HR, Personal, Profile (Educational), Tracking & Bank Account details

put.description: Use 'hr', personal', 'profile', 'tack', 'bank' to update the Engineer HR, Personal, Profile (Educational), Tracking & Bank Account details respectively. Merged API's (updateEmployeeHRData, updateEmployeePersonalData, updateEmployeeProfileData, updateEmployeeTrackingData, updateEmployeeBankData)

parameters.name: engineerData
parameters.description: JSON format of the HR Data of an employee

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to validate & authenticate

get.description: Generate the Salary report/invoice of all the employee

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to validate & authenticate

200.description: Success in updating Employee Profile Details

401.description: Failed to update Employee Profile Details

get.description: Internship Employee list to generate attendance reports who are working with tech company

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to validate & authenticate

200.description: Success in retriving attendance of Internship Employee at client side

401.description: Failed to retrive attendance of Internship Employee at client side

post.description: Internship Employee to generate salary/attendance/invoice reports who are working at client (tech company) (Merged API downloadSalaryReport, downloadAttendanceReport, downloadInvoiceReport)

parameters.name: ReportType
parameters.description: Report Type e.g. salary, attendance, invoice

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Send the Employees list in list format as per the said format

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to validate & authenticate

200.description: Success in generating salary/attendance/invoice report of Engineer

401.description: Failed to generate salary/attendance/invoice report of Engineer

get.description: Get all the employee list in sorted order. It will read `10` employees per request untill the cursor returns `0` which means end of search result.

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to validate & authenticate

200.description: Success in getting list of employee for the searched string

401.description: Failed to get the list of list of employee for the searched string

get.description: Socket search result for the key entered `query`

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to validate & authenticate

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query is the parameter passed to the Socket to enable connection start getting the result.

200.description: Success in getting socket search result

401.description: Failed to get the socket search result.

get.description: Search the engineer by search key (`searchKey`) & cursor. Search key matches the set (engineer name/email) OR (city) OR (company)

parameters.name: searchKey
parameters.description: Search key will match to matches the Alphabets 'A', 'B', 'C' or engineer name, city & company

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor is the position for the redis. Initially it will be 0.

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to validate & authenticate

401.description: Failed to search employee for the search key

get.description: Working days of weeek for a client

parameters.name: clientID
parameters.description: Client ID needs to be valid

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to validate & authenticate

200.description: Success in updating Employee Profile Details

401.description: Failed to update Employee Profile Details

parameters.name: clientID
parameters.description: Client ID needs to be valid

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Valid current or next year

parameters.name: x-token
parameters.description: Token needs to validate & authenticate

200.description: Success in getting the client holiday list for a year

401.description: Failed to retrive the client holiday list for a year
